000010 00000 00001 0000000000000001     # addi $r0 $r1 1
111111 00001 00000 0000000000000001     # asrt $r1 1

000001 00000 00001 00010 00000 000000   # add $r0 $r1 $r2
111111 00010 00000 0000000000000001     # asrt $r2 1

000001 00001 00010 00011 00000 000000   # add $r1 $r2 $r3
111111 00011 00000 0000000000000010     # asrt $r3 2

000001 00010 00011 00100 00000 000000   # add $r2 $r3 $r4
111111 00100 00000 0000000000000011     # asrt $r4 3

000001 00011 00100 00101 00000 000000   # add $r3 $r4 $r5
111111 00101 00000 0000000000000101     # asrt $r5 5

000001 00100 00101 00110 00000 000000   # add $r4 $r5 $r6
111111 00110 00000 0000000000001000     # asrt $r6 8

000001 00101 00110 00111 00000 000000   # add $r5 $r6 $r7
111111 00111 00000 0000000000001101     # asrt $r7 13

000010 00000 01000 1111111111101011     # addi $r0 $8 -21
000001 00111 01000 01001 00000 000000   # add $r7 $8 $9
111111 01001 00000 1111111111111000     # asrt $9 -8

000001 01000 01001 01010 00000 000000   # add $r8 $9 $10
111111 01010 00000 1111111111100011     # asrt $10 -29

000001 01001 01010 01011 00000 000000   # add $r9 $10 $11
111111 01011 00000 1111111111011011     # asrt $11 -37

000001 01010 01011 01100 00000 000000   # add $r10 $11 $12
111111 01100 00000 1111111110111110     # asrt $12 -66

000001 01011 01100 01101 00000 000000   # add $r11 $12 $13
111111 01101 00000 1111111110011001     # asrt $13 -103

000001 01100 01101 01110 00000 000000   # add $r12 $13 $14
111111 01110 00000 1111111101010111     # asrt $14 -169

111100 00000 00000 00000 00000 000000   # halt
